pull.title: Make the command-line-args dialog better
pull.body:
Instead of using a fixed-width font in a label, which virtually
guarantees a horizontal scrollbar, use a proper text-document
that can re-layout based on user input.

events.body:
Screenshots comparing master & this pull. Note that you've removed the version number from the page.
Master
![screen shot](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/5593929/d9284814-926a-11e4-8d79-ccf466660abd.png)
![screen shot 1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/5593930/da78955c-926a-11e4-97ec-121f422207b5.png)

Pull
![screen shot 3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/5593931/e13f80c6-926a-11e4-8e3c-deb9d9a3d326.png)
![screen shot 4](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/5593932/e2a89cfe-926a-11e4-8e46-5f9110580e44.png)
I like the idea of spacing between options, but maybe only half a line?

Re-added the version number; made the middle lines bold and made the cell-padding less.
![commandlineoptions](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/63063/5607108/b9bde6a8-944c-11e4-86ff-faf6615874a2.png)

Certainly looks better.
Nit: it's still using a large fixed-width font here. Looks better after removing

```
ui->helpMessage->setFont(GUIUtil::bitcoinAddressFont());
```

events.message:
Make the command-line-args dialog better

Instead of using a fixed-width font in a label, which virtually
guarentees a horizontal scrollbar, use a proper text-document
that can re-layout based on user input.

events.body: Perhaps we should also remove that graphics to the left then!?

Hey, that's one of the only leftovers of Satoshi!
Anyhow, that doesn't need to be in this pull.
I can take care about the graphic on the left. Needs definitively a replacement (even if its chosen by Satoshi).
Do we need a graphic on this dialogue?

Sorry to comment post-merge here.
On windows this looks pretty compact:
![bildschirmfoto 2015-01-09 um 20 08 02](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/178464/5685529/5303ee9c-983b-11e4-8aa8-cdc7c7d3428d.png)

On OSX it's also a bit tiny:
![bildschirmfoto 2015-01-09 um 20 09 28 1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/178464/5685545/76642398-983b-11e4-890c-4e6b9e101d26.png)

Is there a reason why this is much smaller then the main window?

comments.body: yes. Much less content is shown, especially on the 'about' dialog this resize makes sense.
